RootTable.Filter: select d.ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, d.diagram_type As CLASSTYPE, d.name As Diagram, d.diagram_type As Type, d.Author,d.modifiedDate As Modified, d.notes As [Notes] from t_diagram d where #DB=ORACLE# Upper(d.name) like Upper('<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=SQLSVR# order by 3
